name: io.github.rabyavalla/bonsai-health
title: B.O.N.S.A.I. Health Intelligence API
description: Evidence-based whole-food plant-based (WFPB) lifestyle medicine intelligence. 4 paid API tiers powered by x402 micropayments (USDC on Base). Backed by ACLM, AHA, ADA, WHO, and 637+ peer-reviewed references. Tools: health_query ($0.02), generate_protocol ($0.20), lab_informed_protocol ($0.45), lifestyle_assessment ($0.85).

tools.name: health_query
tools.description: Ask a health, nutrition, or lifestyle medicine question. Returns evidence-based answers with clinical citations.

tools.name: generate_protocol
tools.description: Generate a B.O.N.S.A.I.-scored food-as-medicine protocol for a specific health condition.

tools.name: lab_informed_protocol
tools.description: Generate a biomarker-calibrated dietary protocol using the B.O.N.S.A.I. labs engine.

lab_values.description: Key-value pairs of biomarker names and values

tools.name: lifestyle_assessment
tools.description: Full six-pillar B.O.N.S.A.I. lifestyle assessment with personalized recommendations across nutrition, exercise, sleep, stress, supplements, and labs.
